Name: Caged Beast
About the game: Caged Beast is a dynamic arena shooter where you play as a robot that destroys everything in its path. You will have to survive against a huge number of waves with a variety of enemies. After each wave of opponents, you can choose upgrades for your character to more effectively destroy enemy robots. Features: Music by JordanoCC graphic by Monstorus
